titleStmt.title: A total rout or a brief discovery, of a pack of knaves and drabs, intituled pimps, panders, hectors, trapans, nappers, mobs, and spanners : the description of their qualities, is here set down in brief.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "You Princely Hectors of the Town,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
